description: This file defines a fragment class `VideoDetailsFragment` in an Android application. It manages the display and interaction of video details, including showing the title and description, handling playback actions (play, resume), toggling favorites, and subtitle selection via dialog. The class interfaces with various stores (`FavoritesStore`, `ProgressStore`, `SubtitleSelectionStore`) and repositories (`VideosRepository`, `SubtitlesRepository`) to retrieve and update data, and communicates with its host activity through the `Host` interface.

classes.name: VideoDetailsFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that displays detailed information about a video, allowing playback, resume, favorite toggling, and subtitle selection. It communicates with its host activity via the Host interface.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates a new instance of VideoDetailsFragment with the provided Video object embedded in arguments.
